subject: if you have the ability to get a sumo mandarin, please get one
body:
manager didn't show up to a meeting yesterday because she was unexpectedly stuck in traffic so i got to have a nice social call with kh

got my antidepressant prescriptions refilled and the video call was with an np i saw in person about a year ago and i remembered her saying there was thing extra thing we could potentially try and me bringing that up on the call but not remembering and her going through the records and finding the suggestion she had made, which she then prescribed (and i was also validated in having a good memory)

d asking me therapy-esque questions about my day while i took a long hot shower

a glass of red wine with a charcuterie board dinner, even though i don't drink hardly ever anymore it sometimes really just hits the spot because of that

the sense of well being and being put together i get from having a cleanly shaven face, even though the ritual of shaving is not one i particularly enjoy

it's now sumo mandarin season again and if you have the ability to get a sumo mandarin, please get one (or more), they are the perfect fruit: plump and juicy and sweet and tart and smooth (and easy to peel)

i was on an account management call and a customer described what they wanted to do and i was able to immediately and clearly tell them how to do it and they were very grateful

scheduled date to play online tetris with coworkers next friday

we had slack threads at work about what is the cutest emoji and what is the not cutest emoji in our slack and for not cutest emoji, i put:[weepblood](https://emoji.gg/emoji/cryblood): which is not cute but so often useful in the world of technical support.

ec described my cyberpunk character design as "like a tough Pokemon trainer"
